DOC.brief_summary: Study Objectives : To determine efficacy safety standardise extract Cannabis sativa give orally 2 time daily compare placebo relief muscle stiffness pain multiple sclerosis period 12 week . Study Patients : 400 patient multiple sclerosis ( age 18-64 , stable disease previous 6 month , ambulatory , antispasticity medication physiotherapy stabilise ≥ 30 day ) experience muscle stiffness ≥ 4 11-point numerical Likert scale baseline . Study treatment : Group 1 : Cannabis extract ( delta-9-THC 2.5mg , CBD 1.25 mg per capsule ) , flexible dose 5 mg 25 mg THC/d , administer twice daily , additionally previous antispasticity analgesic medication . Group 2 : Matched placebo , twice daily , additionally previous antispasticity analgesic medication . Treatment Schedule : Start dose 5 mg THC/d , individual dose titration increase 5 mg THC every 3 day , maximal total daily dose 25 mg THC , administer 2 equal dos base tolerability . Treatment duration : 12 week . Study sit : 20 neurological clinic United Kingdom .
